languages.text: "И ты бы пожертвовал им ради миссии?"
"And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"
languages.original_text: "И ты бы пожертвовал им ради миссии?"

traits.locale_text: "And you would sacrifice him for your mission?"
"And you would sacrifice him for your mission?"
"And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"
"And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"
"And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"
"And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

languages.text: 「任務のためなら、彼を犠牲にする覚悟があると？」
languages.original_text: "And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

traits.locale_text: 「任務のためなら、彼を犠牲にする覚悟があると？」

languages.text: "Und Ihr wärt bereit, ihn für Eure Mission zu opfern?"
languages.original_text: "And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr wärt bereit, ihn für Eure Mission zu opfern?"

languages.text: « Seriez-vous prêt à le sacrifier au nom de votre mission ? »
languages.original_text: "And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

traits.locale_text: « Seriez-vous prêt à le sacrifier au nom de votre mission ? »

languages.text: «¿Y estaría dispuesto a sacrificarlo por el bien de su misión?».
languages.original_text: "And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y estaría dispuesto a sacrificarlo por el bien de su misión?».

languages.text: “那如果是为了任务，你愿意牺牲格雷托吗？”
languages.original_text: "And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

traits.locale_text: “那如果是为了任务，你愿意牺牲格雷托吗？”

languages.text: "Peki Glatio'yu görev uğruna feda eder miydin?"
languages.original_text: "And you would be willing to sacrifice him for your mission?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki, Glatio'yu görev uğruna feda eder miydin?"
